title: What is the Wimbledon tennis schedule?
description: Carlos Alcaraz, the two-time defending Wimbledon champion, is back in action Friday at SW19, headlining the day's order of play. Other players who will compete on the fifth day of the main draw include fifth seed Taylor Fritz and home favourite Cameron Norrie. View Friday's featured matches below and the full order of play here. Centre Court (starts 1:30 p.m.)Â  [5] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs. [26] Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) Not before 3 p.m. [2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs. Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) [1] Aryna Sabalenka vs. Emma Raducanu (GBR) No. 1 Court (starts 1 p.m.) Diane Parry (FRA) vs. Sonay Kartal (GBR) Mattia Bellucci (ITA) vs. Cameron Norrie (GBR) [14] Elina Svitolina (UKR) vs. [24] Elise Mertens (BEL) Read More from Wimbledon: Draper: Most players don't bully me, Cilic did Shelton unable to convert 3 MPs before play suspended Munar converts 11th MP in rollercoaster [NEWSLETTER FORM]

text: AELTC/THOMAS LOVELOCK/POOL/AFP via Getty Images The Championships, Wimbledon will be held at the All England Club from 30 June - 13 July. By ATP Staff Carlos Alcaraz, the two-time defending Wimbledon champion, is back in action Friday at SW19, headlining the day's order of play.Other players who will compete on the fifth day of the main draw include fifth seed Taylor Fritz and home favourite Cameron Norrie.No. 1 Court (starts 1 p.m.) Diane Parry (FRA) vs. Sonay Kartal (GBR) Mattia Bellucci (ITA) vs. Cameron Norrie (GBR) [14] Elina Svitolina (UKR) vs. [24] Elise Mertens (BEL)
html:
AELTC/THOMAS LOVELOCK/POOL/AFP via Getty Images

The Championships, Wimbledon will be held at the All England Club from 30 June - 13 July. By ATP Staff

Carlos Alcaraz, the two-time defending Wimbledon champion, is back in action Friday at SW19, headlining the day's order of play.

Other players who will compete on the fifth day of the main draw include fifth seed Taylor Fritz and home favourite Cameron Norrie.

No. 1 Court (starts 1 p.m.)
Diane Parry (FRA) vs. Sonay Kartal (GBR)
Mattia Bellucci (ITA) vs. Cameron Norrie (GBR)
[14] Elina Svitolina (UKR) vs. [24] Elise Mertens (BEL)
